snippet: Drought and other factors have created historically low water marks for the Great Lakes, putting a $34 billion shipping industry in peril, a situation that could send ripples through the economy.
abstract: Drought and other factors have created historically low water marks for nation's Great Lakes, putting $34 billion shipping industry in peril; situation could send ripples through United States economy.
lead_paragraph: Drought and other factors have created historically low water marks for the Great Lakes, putting a $34 billion shipping industry in peril, a situation that could send ripples through the economy.

headline.seo: Great Lakes Shipping Suffers as Water Levels Fall
headline.main: Water Levels Fall in Great Lakes, Taking a Toll on Shipping
headline.print_headline: Water Levels Fall In Great Lakes, Taking a Toll On Shipping
